short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables random tab selection or complete tab shuffling with a click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Randomizer has 2 main functionalities being:

• Jumping to a random tab within your window
• Shuffling your open tabs to a new order

Or you can even use both features at once, all at the click of a button

Alongside these functionalities are the options to: 
• Close your current tab when going to a random tab or randomizing the order
• Displaying the number of Tabs currently open in your window
